QuestData.Title: That Which Has Risen
QuestData.Description: When I sensed these... things... rising from below, I came to put them back down. I found the corpse of your friend and dragged him as far as I could before one of my fetlocks was broken. It is all that I can do to hold off these foul tendrils.$B$BThere is one that controls the tendrils and eyes. It calls itself Harbinger Aphotic -- I'm sure that you have heard it yelling from the south.$B$BThe harbinger stands out of range of my magic, but you could get to him. If you dare....
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Return this vile creature below from whence it came.
QuestData.CompletionText: The harbinger yet lives, $n. I cannot begin to cleanse Lake Falathim until it is slain.
QuestData.RewardText: With the death of the harbinger, I can begin to cleanse the lake.$B$BYou have my deepest thanks, $n. I mourn the loss of your friend, but know that his remains will fuel the reclamation of the forest hereabouts.
